trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemDeleted"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 提供有关数据<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemDeleted"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemDeleted> event when a Delete button (a button with its `CommandName` property set to "Delete") within the control is clicked, but after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control deletes the record.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控件都将引发<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemDeleted>事件的删除按钮时 (带按钮其`CommandName`属性设置为"Delete") 在控件内单击时，但之后<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控件中删除记录。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemDeleted> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: This allows you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as checking the results of a delete operation, whenever this event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 这使您可以提供执行自定义的例程，例如检查删除操作的结果，每次此事件发生时的事件处理方法。

trans-unit.source: A FormViewDeletedEventArgs object is passed to the event-handling method, which allows you to determine the number of records affected and any exceptions that might have occurred.
trans-unit.target: FormViewDeletedEventArgs 对象传递给事件处理方法，可用于确定受影响的记录数以及可能发生的任何异常。

trans-unit.source: To determine the number of records affected by the delete operation, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewDeletedEventArgs.AffectedRows%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要确定删除操作所影响的记录数，请使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewDeletedEventArgs.AffectedRows%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewDeletedEventArgs.AffectedRows%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewDeletedEventArgs.Exception%2A> property to determine whether any exceptions occurred.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewDeletedEventArgs.Exception%2A>属性以确定是否发生任何异常。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewDeletedEventArgs.Exception%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can also indicate whether the exception was handled in the event-handling method by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewDeletedEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 您还可以指示是否处理了该异常的事件处理方法中通过设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewDeletedEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewDeletedEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If an exception occurs during the delete operation and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewDeletedEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A> property is set to `false`, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control re-throws the exception.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 如果删除操作过程中发生异常和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewDeletedEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A>属性设置为`false`、<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控件重新引发的异常。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewDeletedEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you want to access the name/value pairs of the key fields and non-key fields of the deleted record, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewDeletedEventArgs.Keys%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewDeletedEventArgs.Values%2A> properties, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想要访问的键字段和非键字段的已删除的记录的名称/值对，使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewDeletedEventArgs.Keys%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewDeletedEventArgs.Values%2A>属性，分别。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewDeletedEventArgs.Values%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewDeletedEventArgs.Keys%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB︰ 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewDeletedEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewDeletedEventArgs"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewDeletedEventArgs> class.
trans-unit.target: 使用此构造函数初始化<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewDeletedEventArgs>类</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewDeletedEventArgs>的新实例

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewDeletedEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: 下表显示<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewDeletedEventArgs>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewDeletedEventArgs>实例的初始属性的值

trans-unit.source: |Property|Initial value| |--------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewDeletedEventArgs.AffectedRows%2A>|The value of the `affectedRows` parameter.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewDeletedEventArgs.Exception%2A>|The <xref:System.Exception?displayProperty=fullName> object contained in the `e` parameter.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewDeletedEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A>|Initialized to `false`.| > [!NOTE] > This constructor is used primarily by control developers when raising events.
trans-unit.target: |属性 |初始值 | |--------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewDeletedEventArgs.AffectedRows%2A>|值`affectedRows`参数。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewDeletedEventArgs.Exception%2A>|中包含的<xref:System.Exception?displayProperty=fullName>对象`e`参数。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewDeletedEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A>|初始化为`false`。 | &1;> [!NOTE]&1;> 在引发事件时，主要由控件开发人员使用此构造函数。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewDeletedEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A> </xref:System.Exception?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewDeletedEventArgs.Exception%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewDeletedEventArgs.AffectedRows%2A>

trans-unit.source: The number of rows affected by the delete operation.
trans-unit.target: 删除操作所影响的行数。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Exception> that represents the exception raised when the delete operation was performed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Exception>，表示执行删除操作时引发的异常。</xref:System.Exception>

trans-unit.source: If no exception is raised, use <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> for this parameter.
trans-unit.target: 如果不引发任何异常，则使用<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>为此参数。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of rows affected by the delete operation.
trans-unit.target: 获取删除操作所影响的行的数。

trans-unit.source: Use the AffectedRows property to determine the number of records affected by the delete operation.
trans-unit.target: AffectedRows 属性用于确定的删除操作所影响的记录数。

trans-unit.source: This property is commonly used to verify that the correct number of records was deleted in the following situations: - Verify that only a single record was deleted.
trans-unit.target: 此属性通常用于验证是否在以下情况下是否删除了正确的记录数:-确认是否已删除单个记录。

trans-unit.source: Sometimes an improperly written delete statement can delete multiple records.
trans-unit.target: 有时编写不当的 delete 语句可能会删除多个记录。

trans-unit.source: - Verify that a record was deleted when an error occurs during the delete operation that does not raise an exception.
trans-unit.target: -验证在不会引发异常的删除操作期间发生错误时删除了记录。

trans-unit.source: - Verify that a record was deleted when a data source control that supports conflict detection (optimistic concurrency), such as the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> controls, has its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.ConflictDetection%2A> property set to the `ConflictOptions.CompareAllValues` enumeration value.
trans-unit.target: -验证某个记录被删除时数据源控件的支持冲突检测 （乐观并发），如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>控制，具有其<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.ConflictDetection%2A>属性设置为`ConflictOptions.CompareAllValues`枚举值。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.ConflictDetection%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>

trans-unit.source: Under this setting, a record that has been modified by another user concurrently might not be deleted.
trans-unit.target: 在此设置，可能不会删除已被另一个用户同时修改的记录。

trans-unit.source: The number of rows affected by the delete operation.
trans-unit.target: 删除操作所影响的行数。

trans-unit.source: Gets the exception (if any) that was raised during the delete operation.
trans-unit.target: 获取的异常 （如果有） 删除操作过程中引发。

trans-unit.source: Use the Exception property to determine the exception (if any) that was raised during the delete operation.
trans-unit.target: 使用异常属性以确定异常 （如果有） 删除操作过程中引发。

trans-unit.source: If no exceptions were raised, this property returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: 如果未引发异常，此属性返回`null`。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If an exception was raised and you decide to handle the exception in the event handler, be sure to set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewDeletedEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A> property to `true`; otherwise, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control re-throws the exception.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 如果引发了异常，并且你决定要处理的事件处理程序中的异常，请务必设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewDeletedEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A>属性`true`; 否则为<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控件重新引发的异常。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewDeletedEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Exception> that represents the exception that was raised during the delete operation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Exception>，表示删除操作过程中引发的异常。</xref:System.Exception>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether an exception that was raised during the delete operation was handled in the event handler.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否已执行删除操作期间引发的异常处理过在事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: When an exception is raised during the delete operation, use the ExceptionHandled property to indicate whether the exception was handled in the event handler.
trans-unit.target: 当执行删除操作期间引发了异常时，则使用 ExceptionHandled 属性以指示是否处理了该异常在事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: When this property is set to `true`, the exception is considered handled and is not re-thrown.
trans-unit.target: 当此属性设置为`true`，将异常认为是进行处理并且不会重新引发。

trans-unit.source: If this property is set to `false`, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control re-throws the exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果此属性设置为`false`、<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控件重新引发的异常。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: To determine which exception was raised, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewDeletedEventArgs.Exception%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要确定引发哪个异常，请使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewDeletedEventArgs.Exception%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewDeletedEventArgs.Exception%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the exception was handled in the event handler; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果异常已处理在事件处理程序;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets an ordered dictionary of key field name/value pairs for the deleted record.
trans-unit.target: 获取已删除的记录的键字段名称/值对的有序的字典。

trans-unit.source: The Keys property contains the values of the key fields listed in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.DataKeyNames%2A> property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control.
trans-unit.target: 键属性包含的键字段中列出的值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.DataKeyNames%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.DataKeyNames%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the Keys property to access the values of the key fields (as specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.DataKeyNames%2A> property) for a deleted record.
trans-unit.target: 键属性，用于访问的键字段的值 (所指定的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.DataKeyNames%2A>属性) 的已删除的记录。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.DataKeyNames%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, you can use these values to keep a log of deleted records.
trans-unit.target: 例如，可以使用这些值来记录已删除的记录。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This property contains only the key fields specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.DataKeyNames%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 此属性包含仅在指定的键字段<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.DataKeyNames%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.DataKeyNames%2A>

trans-unit.source: To access the non-key fields, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewDeletedEventArgs.Values%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要访问非键字段，请使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewDeletedEventArgs.Values%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewDeletedEventArgs.Values%2A>

trans-unit.source: The Keys property returns an <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary> object that implements the <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary?displayProperty=fullName> interface.
trans-unit.target: 键属性返回<xref:System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary>实现对象<xref:System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary?displayProperty=fullName>接口。</xref:System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary> object contains <xref:System.Collections.DictionaryEntry?displayProperty=fullName> objects that represent the key fields of the deleted record.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary>对象包含<xref:System.Collections.DictionaryEntry?displayProperty=fullName>表示已删除的记录的键字段的对象。</xref:System.Collections.DictionaryEntry?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary>

trans-unit.source: To access the field names, use the <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary.Keys%2A> property of the <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary> object.
trans-unit.target: 若要访问的字段名称，使用<xref:System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary.Keys%2A>属性<xref:System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary>对象。</xref:System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary> </xref:System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary.Keys%2A>

trans-unit.source: Similarly, you can access the field values by using the <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary.Values%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 同样，通过使用访问的字段值<xref:System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary.Values%2A>属性。</xref:System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary.Values%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > As a shortcut, you can also use the indexer of the <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary> object to access the key field values.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 作为快捷方式，你还可以使用的索引器<xref:System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary>对象来访问的键字段值。</xref:System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary>

trans-unit.source: The advantage in using the indexer is that it returns key field values directly.
trans-unit.target: 使用索引器的优点是它直接返回键字段值。

trans-unit.source: Data source controls that rely on the field order (such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource>) can access key field values only by index.
trans-unit.target: 数据源的字段顺序所依赖的控件 (如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource>) 只能按索引访问键字段值。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary"></xref> that contains key field name/value pairs for the deleted record.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary"> </xref>包含已删除的记录的键字段名称/值对。

trans-unit.source: Gets a dictionary of the non-key field name/value pairs for the deleted record.
trans-unit.target: 获取已删除的记录非键字段名称/值对的字典。

trans-unit.source: Use the Values property to access the values of the non-key fields for a deleted record.
trans-unit.target: 值属性用于访问已删除的记录的非键字段的值。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can use these values to keep a log of deleted records.
trans-unit.target: 例如，可以使用这些值来记录已删除的记录。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The Values property is populated only when two-way binding expressions are used in the item template.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 仅当在项模板中使用双向绑定表达式时填充值属性。

trans-unit.source: For more information on two-way binding expressions, see [Binding to Databases](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/ab7b2846-975b-4057-a948-45527497c742).
trans-unit.target: 双向绑定表达式的详细信息，请参阅[绑定到数据库](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/ab7b2846-975b-4057-a948-45527497c742)。

trans-unit.source: The Values property returns an <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary> object that implements the <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary?displayProperty=fullName> interface.
trans-unit.target: 值属性返回<xref:System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary>实现对象<xref:System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary?displayProperty=fullName>接口。</xref:System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary> object contains <xref:System.Collections.DictionaryEntry?displayProperty=fullName> objects that represent the non-key fields of the deleted record.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary>对象包含<xref:System.Collections.DictionaryEntry?displayProperty=fullName>表示已删除的记录的非键字段的对象。</xref:System.Collections.DictionaryEntry?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary>

trans-unit.source: To access the field names, use the <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary.Keys%2A> property of the <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary> object.
trans-unit.target: 若要访问的字段名称，使用<xref:System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary.Keys%2A>属性<xref:System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary>对象。</xref:System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary> </xref:System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary.Keys%2A>

trans-unit.source: Similarly, you can access the field values by using the <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary.Values%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 同样，通过使用访问的字段值<xref:System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary.Values%2A>属性。</xref:System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary.Values%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > As a shortcut, you can also use the indexer of the <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary> object to access the field values.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 作为快捷方式，你还可以使用的索引器<xref:System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary>对象来访问的字段值。</xref:System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary>

trans-unit.source: The advantage in using the indexer is that it returns field values directly.
trans-unit.target: 使用索引器的优点是它直接返回字段值。

trans-unit.source: Data source controls that rely on the field order (such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource>) can access field values only by index.
trans-unit.target: 数据源的字段顺序所依赖的控件 (如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource>) 只能按索引访问字段值。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource>

trans-unit.source: This property does not contain the key fields (as specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.DataKeyNames%2A> property) for the deleted record.
trans-unit.target: 此属性不包含的键字段 (所指定的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.DataKeyNames%2A>属性) 的已删除的记录。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.DataKeyNames%2A>

trans-unit.source: To access the key fields, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewDeletedEventArgs.Keys%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要访问的键字段，请使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewDeletedEventArgs.Keys%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewDeletedEventArgs.Keys%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary"></xref> that contains a dictionary of the non-key field name/value pairs for the deleted record.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary"> </xref> ，包含已删除的记录的非键字段名称/值对的字典。
